name: I am Prototype
description:
I am Prototype is a short game made for the Godot Wild Jam #51.

You, an experimental robot, find yourself in a research facility after gaining sentience. Attaching other prototype parts to yourself, you try to escape to the outside world.

Controls:
[Arrow keys] - Movement
[Z] - Use left arm
[X] - Use right arm
[Enter] - Confirm in menus

Credits:
Art, music, and sounds done by SoraIllusion
